settings.title: Consultancy Services
settings.header_excerpt: From expert advice to farm design and installation, we can help you succeed in mushroom cultivation.

settings.section_title: Ready to talk to an expert?

settings.rich_text:
We provide consultancy services to assist individuals, professionals, and companies in developing and optimising their projects.

We firmly believe that mushrooms, permaculture, and urban farming installations are fundamental components of a thriving green economy, providing healthy lifestyles, job opportunities, and profitability.

Our designs are suitable for both urban and rural settings, blending functionality with modern design. With a dedicated commitment to creating a circular economy, we view urban farming as a tool for our clients to achieve their goals.

Whether the focus is on producing fresh food with a minimal carbon footprint or to support employee well-being, our services are tailored to your needs. Our consultancy database features specialists in their fields, enabling us to offer holistic solutions tailored to your unique circumstances.

settings.quote: We provide consultancy services to assist individuals, professionals, and companies in developing and optimising their projects.

settings.title: Design
settings.description: We provide thorough assessment and custom design services for small and medium-scale mushroom cultivation. We help clients optimise their space, whether in commercial or public venues. Your preferences, budget, and aesthetics guide our energy and implementation process.

settings.case_study_title: Installing a Mushroom Farm in Wales
settings.case_study_excerpt: Specialising in high ROI mushroom farm setups, we cater to both small-scale local demands and large-scale investment projects. Our workshops introduce the exciting world of mushrooms to all ages, fostering enthusiasm and knowledge.
